short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iFinder, a Web search assistant to enhance your search efficiency.
short.zh_CN: 关键词Finder，提升你的网页搜索效率

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding information online taking too much time and effort? Try iFinder, the browser highlighting extension! It automatically highlights the keywords you're looking for, helping you find information faster.

Feature list
1. Auto Highlights!
Based on your search content, iFinder intelligently generates and highlights keywords without the need for manual input. Works great with Google search.
2. Powerful & Flexible
The most powerful search extension on the web! Without altering your browser's default search functionality, it adds features like automatic highlighting, multi-keyword support, matched keyword positioning, case matching, and whole-word matching.
3. 100% Private
No user data is collected, and all data is stored locally. There's no need to worry about privacy and security.
4. Keyboard Shortcuts
Supports keyboard shortcuts for easier and more convenient operation.
